reason: The Has data type was removed to simplify service composition and improve ergonomics. ZIO 2.x uses ZEnvironment instead.
bracket is deprecated and renamed to acquireReleaseWith, and its acquire parameter is now by-name to avoid eager evaluation.
Parallelism is no longer encoded in the API name. Parallelism is controlled via withParallelism or withParallelismUnbounded.
zio.App is deprecated in favor of ZIOAppDefault which provides a simpler application model.
Unsafe execution is now explicit via the Unsafe capability to distinguish unsafe code paths.
